remarks: Weak property deduction for a norm.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)
statement:
nmpropd.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( Base ` K ) = ( Base ` L ) ) $.
nmpropd.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( +g ` K ) = ( +g ` L ) ) $.
nmpropd.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( dist ` K ) = ( dist ` L ) ) $.
nmpropd $p |- ( ph -> ( norm ` K ) = ( norm ` L ) ) $.
